lessons.japanese: １０月に総会を開催すべきだという提案があった。
lessons.english: There was a suggestion that the general meeting should take place in October.

lessons.japanese: 日本は国連総会で米国側に立った。
lessons.english: Japan stood with the United States at the U. N. Assembly.

lessons.japanese: 多数の会員が総会に出席した。
lessons.english: A lot of members assisted at the general meeting.

lessons.japanese: 総会に出席し、データ転送の新技術を知ることができました。
lessons.english: Participating in the general meeting raised my awareness of the new technologies in data transportation.

lessons.japanese: 国連総会は停戦決議案を採択した。
lessons.english: The United Nations General Assembly adopted the cease-fire resolution.

lessons.japanese: １０月に総会を開催すべきだという提案があった。
lessons.english: There was a suggestion that the general meeting should take place in October.

lessons.japanese: 国連総会は停戦決議案を採択した。
lessons.english: The United Nations General Assembly adopted the cease-fire resolution.

lessons.english: Participating in the general meeting raised my awareness of the new technologies in data transportation.

lessons.japanese: 多数の会員が総会に出席した。
lessons.english: A lot of members assisted at the general meeting.

lessons.japanese: 日本は国連総会で米国側に立った。
lessons.english: Japan stood with the United States at the U. N. Assembly.

lessons.japanese: 彼らは貿易問題についての特別総会を開催した。
lessons.english: They held a special session on trade problems.
